The incredible harm of isolation in LTC, group homes & other congregate care settings must & can stop. Bill 203, the #morethanavisitor Act sets the framework for caregiver access to happen safely, consistently & in a way that is meaningful to residents receiving care. #onpoli

My parents are married for 55 years. They were kept apart for 137 days during the height of the pandemic. He lives in a LTC home for Veterans. He’s never going to “get better” and come home. Spending months sad and alone was worse than any virus. 🇨🇦😞#NeverAgain
